name: lri-prototype
description: Frontend + FastAPI backend scaffold for LRI prototype

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: echo 'Building frontend...' && mkdir -p dist && cp -r front/* dist/
scripts.build:backend: echo 'Setting up backend...' && python3 -m venv .venv && . .venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
